name: Hazatron
description:
Hazatron is top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements.

Heavy mech doomed to fight endless hordes of alien mechanoids

Your mech is kinda slow and not too dangerous in the beginning.

Use Azure earned from defeated enemies to make it hulking death machine :
 ■ unlock and upgrade weapons,
 ■ upgrade mech abilities,
 ■ unlock and upgrade plug-in chips (altering and enhancing mech performance)

Money earned during missions to perma-upgrade weapons and chips. 

Early Access

Game is in active developments, so any feedback is welcome!

There is in-game feedback form - just press F1 during gameplay.
